markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Draconic Arrogance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1603) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[dragon instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

Few can sway you from your goals while the fury of combat fills you. While raging, you gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects.
name: Draconic Arrogance
